DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine beta-glucan affect immune system subject non-small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Beta-glucan Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Beta-glucan ( Imucell WGP ) over-the-counter dietary supplement enhance body 's immune system . Imucell WGP extract food-grade baker 's yeast , permit use food U.S. Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) . Studies animal show Imucell WGP help trigger white blood cell destroy cancer cell . Other animal study combine Imucell WGP anti-cancer medication show great tumor regression tumor-free survival .
